menu.name: Thorn-Bit Studios
menu.desc: The people behind this demo of NKO

menu.name: Composers
menu.desc: The people who composed all the music for the mod

github.desc: Composed every song except for Accolades and Sweet Reap

menu.name: Artists
menu.desc: The people who make the mod look how it looks

menu.name: Animators
menu.desc: The people who make the art move

github.desc: Nate, Pixie, BF, and Mad Animations

menu.name: Charters
menu.desc: The people that make the songs playable

github.desc: Charted Stagefright (Hard), High (Nate Mix), & Darnell (Nate Mix)

menu.name: Extra Events
menu.desc: The people that added the events that aren't the charters for that song

github.desc: Added events to Sweet Reap, High (Nate Mix), & Darnell (Nate Mix)

menu.name: Coders
menu.desc: The people who make the mod function the way it does

github.desc: Coded in the stages for Accolades & Sweet Reap

menu.name: Voice Actors
menu.desc: The people that give life to the characters

menu.name: Non-Demo Team
menu.desc: The people in the dev team whose work didn't make it into this demo, but will be in v1

menu.desc: People outside of Thorn-Bit Studios who helped make NKO possible

menu.desc: Anyone who contributed to the mod in any way
